content:
Art. 4.14. 
Applications
 Substitution takes place ad infinitum in the direct descending line.
 Substitution does not take place in favour of ascendants; the nearest in each of the two lines always excludes the most distant.
 In the collateral line, substitution is made in favour of descendants of brothers and sisters, uncles and aunts of the deceased.
 Substitution does not apply to descendants of the spouse or legal cohabitant.
